name: it.iit.sallo
description:
this package contains a suite of tools for the assessment of low-level cues on orientation.
It aims to simplify the development of psychophysical experiments in virtual reality

author.name: Davide Esposito
author.company: Unit for Visually Impaired People, Fondazione Istituto Italiano di Tecnologia

samples.description: working example of how to run a desktop experiment using SALLO and UXF. See https://github.com/immersivecognition/unity-experiment-framework for more details about UXF.
